channel.title: I got problem with my server.. can anyone help please?
channel.description: hey i got everything down like i did the port fowarding thing with router and then i went to no-ip and yeah everything works' till my friend trys to login on his computer it says " error connecting to server" and the server is online etc... any help plz?
